channel.title: Friction

item.title: Friction: AI and Playaz Recordings
item.description: Artificial Intelligence are in the mix for Friction, plus the DNB60 comes from Playaz Recordings, courtesy of Potential Badboy.
item.itunes:author: BBC
item.itunes:subtitle: Artificial Intelligence are in the mix for Friction, plus Playaz supply the DNB60.
item.itunes:summary: Artificial Intelligence are in the mix for Friction, plus Playaz supply the DNB60.

item.title: Friction: Krakota and Exit's Module Eight
item.description: Friction has a guest mix from Krakota and the DNB60's from Exit Records' Module Eight.
